title: Protocol Cell Culture
description: Description of cell culture specific protocols.

culture_start_date.title: Culture start date
culture_start_date.description: The date the culture was started.
culture_start_date.comment: Date can be submitted in as YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSTZD ((TZD is the time zone designator; use Z to express time in UTC or for time expressed in local time add a time zone offset from UTC +HH:MM or -HH:MM).

culture_harvest_date.title: Culture harvest date
culture_harvest_date.description: The date the culture was harvested.
culture_harvest_date.comment: Date can be submitted in as YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSTZD ((TZD is the time zone designator; use Z to express time in UTC or for time expressed in local time add a time zone offset from UTC +HH:MM or -HH:MM).

culture_duration.title: Culture duration
culture_duration.description: Time cells in culture since first thaw

protocol_SOP_deviations.title: Additional Protocol with Deviations from SOP

protocol_additional.title: Additional Protocol for Cell Culture
protocol_additional.description: Protocol for additonal treatments like synchronization

passage_number.title: Passage Number
passage_number.description: Number of passages of the cell culture

differentiation_state.title: Differentiation State
differentiation_state.description: Description of markers used to determine the differentiation state of embryonic stem cells.

morphology_image.title: Morphology Image
morphology_image.description: Photo of Cell Morphology at the time of collection

karyotype_image.title: Karyotype
karyotype_image.description: Image of the karyotype of potentially genomically unstable lines
karyotype_image.comment: Please supply a karyotype image if the passage number is 10 or more, or sequencing data for karyotype information data is not available.

karyotype.title: Karyotype
karyotype.description: Chromosome count and any noted rearrangements or copy number variation

synchronization_stage.title: Synchronization stage
synchronization_stage.description: Cell cycle stage at which culture is synchronized

follows_sop.title: Follows SOP
follows_sop.description: Flag to indicate if the 4DN SOP for the specified cell line was followed - Yes or No
